subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The Belmont winner Tonalist was to be joined by Bayern and Wicked Strong at the 145th edition of the mile-and-a-quarter race at Saratoga Race Course.
snippet: The Belmont winner Tonalist was to be joined by Bayern and Wicked Strong at the 145th edition of the mile-and-a-quarter race at Saratoga Race Course.
